name: @cubejs-backend/native
author: Cube Dev, Inc.
description: Native module for Cube.js (binding to Rust codebase)

scripts.build: tsc && cargo-cp-artifact -a cdylib cubejs-native index.node -- cargo build --message-format=json-render-diagnostics
scripts.build-debug: npm run tsc && npm run build --
scripts.build-release: npm run tsc && npm run build -- --release
scripts.upload-binary: npm run build-release && mkdir -p native && cp index.node native/index.node && node-pre-gyp package && node-pre-gyp-github publish
